P

PacFrame - Class in <Unnamed>
This class extends the JFrame and coordinate all panels on one frame.
PacFrame(Game, GameController) - Constructor for class PacFrame
In this method, the character for frame is settled, and all panels are called and located at the Frame.
PacMan - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents Pacman
PacMan(int, Position, int) - Constructor for class PacMan
Initializes Pacman's lifes, position and mouthDegree with the specified values.
PacmanLogoPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
This panel contains the heading "Pacman" that is printed in the start menu
PacmanLogoPanel(Game) - Constructor for class PacmanLogoPanel
Get information from class Game to settle down the size of this panel.
PacPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
This class draws the main Panel of the game.
PacPanel(Game) - Constructor for class PacPanel
Get map information from the main class, to setle down the size for the PacPanel.
paint(Graphics) - Method in class PacmanLogoPanel
paints the heading for the start menu
paint(Graphics) - Method in class PacPanel
Paint all staffs on the PacPanel.
paint(Graphics) - Method in class PanelLeft
Paint the scores and lives
paint(Graphics) - Method in class PanelRight
Paint the level and fruits
paint(Graphics) - Method in class StartPanel
paint title and the menu icons on the panel
PanelLeft - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is the panel at the left side of PacFrame, to show the Scores and lives.
PanelLeft(Game) - Constructor for class PanelLeft
To set the size and color of this left panel.
PanelRight - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is the Panel at the left side of Pacpanel, draw the Level and fruit information.
PanelRight(Game) - Constructor for class PanelRight
To set the size and color of this right panel.
Position - Class in <Unnamed>
This class hold a position represented by a x-coordinate and a y-coordinate.
Position(int, int) - Constructor for class Position
Initializes the coordinates of a new position with the specified values.
